column8: So I read that bijan will give rm1k if I also invest 1k into PRS fund. But is it like unit trust where you need to choose which fund to invest it? or like EPF where you just deposit to the bank fund and let them do it?And which bank got? I saw like PBB mutual/ cimb investment etc. Pls guide me sifu
capitol not guaranteed, return worst than FD.so go figure.

RM500 for invest for 1k.A lot of bank got. The main one is like you said PBB mutual is strong in unit trust but I'm using CIMB PRS as it's convenient since all my bank transactions are done within CIMB.Capital is not guaranteed but doesn't mean someone can't try to invest if they are trying to diversify their portfolio.Same like all unit trust or shares or even the house that you buy. Nothing is guaranteed.My CIMB PRS fund capital went up by 30% after the downfall last year.This is not including the 20% tax rebate that I receive up to RM3000 per year.https://www.fundsupermart.com.my/main/fundi...ass-C-MYCPPRS5CDon't give people wrong information based on your wrong perception.
but but but PRS can claim tax relief up to RM3K...but can claim another 5 more years.. not coming this year (2016) punya tax declaration la..

bodo.3k per year for tax relief, somemore fsm got giveaway like starbucks card or movie tickets if you pay 3k in one shot on end of the year.and if you're under 30 years old you will get one-time-off 1k incentive from government if you contribute 1k within one calendar year.
fsm veli popular these days thx to the gurus in the finance section
Bijan will give you 1k when you invest 1k?Are you sure that he's not going to take it away instead?
i gt what u meant, sorry about that as i didnt realise theres tnc.
